experience.title: Data Science Intern
experience.description: •Developed a NLP-based text standardization model to ease credit-risk modeling process •Adopted a 3-stage process involving pre-processing, text contextualization and spelling correction•Constructed mapping functions for different variables using Pandas, Pyspark, Fuzzywuzzy and Difflib•Formulated statistical performance metrics and compared the final results with a labeled dataset•Achieved match score of 95.4% and reduced the bag of words count by 58% on a data of over 35 crore users
experience.description_html: •Developed a NLP-based text standardization model to ease credit-risk modeling process •Adopted a 3-stage process involving pre-processing, text contextualization and spelling correction•Constructed mapping functions for different variables using Pandas, Pyspark, Fuzzywuzzy and Difflib•Formulated statistical performance metrics and compared the final results with a labeled dataset•Achieved match score of 95.4% and reduced the bag of words count by 58% on a data of over 35 crore users
